arts.ttl: Serie A | Lecce 2-2 Parma: Self-destruction to fumble lead in stoppages
arts.sum: Lecce committed calcio self-destruction tonight by fumbling a 2-0 lead during stoppages against Parma, in...

arts.ttl: Lecce’s Gotti: “I feel we’re growing day by day”
arts.sum: Lecce manager Luca Gotti addressed the media ahead of his team’s upcoming match against Parma at the Via del Mare stadium. The coach expressed optimism about his squad’s development and discussed the challenges posed by their opponents. On preparing for the match, Gotti said, “Parma is the first team with a four-man defense that we’ll face in this championship. This will change our offensive and defensive outputs. Numerically, they have the same system as us, but with different playing lines and characteristics. There are similarities in the construct of ideas. They’re a very fast team with many quality players.” Regarding The post Lecce’s Gotti: “I feel we’re growing day by day” appeared first on FootItalia.com.

arts.ttl: Serie A | Lecce v Parma: Match Preview
arts.sum: Two sides looking to build momentum in the early stages of the Serie A season will face off on Saturday evening as Lecce host Parma at the Stadio Via del Mare. Both teams have collected 4 points from their opening 4 matches and will be eager to climb the table with a positive result. Lecce have shown signs of improvement after a difficult start to the campaign. Luca Gotti’s men lost their opening two fixtures against Atalanta and Inter Milan, but have since steadied the ship with a 1-0 win over Cagliari and a creditable 0-0 draw away to Torino The post Serie A | Lecce v Parma: Match Preview appeared first on FootItalia.com.
